titleStmt.title: Cassandra the fam'd romance : the whole work : in five parts / written originally in French ; now elegantly rendred into English by a person of quality.
Cassandre. English
titleStmt.author: La Calprenède, Gaultier de Coste, seigneur de, d. 1663.
Cotterell, Charles, Sir, d. 1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley ... William Bentley and Thomas Heath ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation by Sir Charles Cotterell of: Cassandre.
